register.details: Registration happens with your Battle.Net tag and (optionally) your platform (pc, psn or xbl).

output.no-account-found: [N|n]o account has been found with the given information. Please check if your Battle.Net tag and platform are correct and try again.

rank-channel.description: Sets the target channel for the rank update messages
rank-channel.details: Use `none` or a channel. If the channel is not specified, it will show the current target channel. If `none` is specified, the rank update messages will not be posted.

args.channel-prompt: [W|w]hich target channel would you like to use?

output.disabled: [T|t]he channel has been removed and rank updating has been disabled for this server.
output.no-permissions: I need the permission 'Read Messages' for this channel.

embed.rank-decrease: Competitive skill rating has been decreased with {{difference}} from {{oldRank}} SR to **{{newRank}} SR**.
embed.rank-increase: Competitive skill rating has been increased with {{difference}} from {{oldRank}} SR to **{{newRank}} SR**.
embed.ranking-change: Competitive rank has been changed from {{oldRanking}} to **{{newRanking}}**.
embed.title: {{accountName}} ({{platform}})

overwatch.details: The details are checked once in a while and might not be up-to-date.
